name: Spare Parts and Services Pricing
content: Focus on practical tools and approaches that are appropriate to the industry of today and the future Interactive with hands-on exercises Learn from each other and network with your pricing colleagues from different industries. Brochure https://go.evvnt.com/249259-2?pid=4868 Prices: Spare Parts and Services Pricing - 2 days: EUR 1695.0 BRING A COLLEAGUE AND GET -25% DISCOUNT ON BOTH TICKETS - price pp: EUR 1271.0 Speakers: Navetti Time: on Monday November 05, 2018 at 9:00 am (ends Tuesday November 06, 2018 at 5:00 pm) Venue details: TBC, Düsseldorf, Germany
